body_html:
@burglarhobbit still I'm not sure whether these issues are related. It'd be good to rule this one out before spending time debugging that one separately, though.

Can you build from source with cuda 8? Annoying for sure, but the fix is in C++ and so needs to be compiled.

body:
@burglarhobbit still I'm not sure whether these issues are related. It'd be good to rule this one out before spending time debugging that one separately, though.

Can you build from source with cuda 8? Annoying for sure, but the fix is in C++ and so needs to be compiled.
